tool_description: Schedules and manages automated backup restore testing across multiple backup sources and environments, maintaining test execution history and results.

test_name.description: Name identifier for this test schedule

backup_sources.description: List of backup sources to include in testing

test_frequency.description: Test execution frequency (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly)

test_time.description: Preferred execution time in HH:MM format

environment_type.description: Type of test environment to use (docker, vm, cloud)

max_concurrent_tests.description: Maximum number of concurrent test executions

test_timeout_hours.description: Maximum hours to allow for each test

notification_email.description: Email address for test result notifications

retain_test_data_days.description: Days to retain test environment data

skip_weekends.description: Whether to skip test execution on weekends

error_messages: Invalid test frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly].
Invalid time format: test_time must be in HH:MM format (24-hour).
Unsupported environment type: Use one of [docker, vm, cloud].
Invalid concurrent limit: max_concurrent_tests must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid timeout: test_timeout_hours must be between 1 and 24.
Invalid retention period: retain_test_data_days must be between 1 and 30.
Backup source not found: One or more backup sources are not accessible.
usage: Provide test_name, backup_sources array, test_frequency, test_time, and environment_type. Configure additional parameters for concurrent execution and notifications.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created test schedule

next_execution_time.description: Next scheduled execution date and time

scheduled_tests_count.description: Number of backup sources scheduled for testing

estimated_duration_hours.description: Estimated total duration for all scheduled tests

schedule_status.description: Status of the schedule (active, inactive, error)
